titleStmt.title: The answere to the fyrst parte of the poysened booke, which a namelesse heretyke hath named the souper of the lorde. By syr Thomas More knyght
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

publicationStmt.publisher: Prented by w. Rastell in Fletestreet in saynt Brydys chyrch yarde,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Tyndale, William. The souper of the Lorde.
Imprint from colophon. "Actually pr[inted]. before Christmas 1533"--STC addendum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Fletestreet in saynt Brydys chyrch yarde
